titleStmt.title: An admonition moving to moderation, holding forth certain brief heads of wholesom advice to the late, and yet immoderate party. / By John Gaule, minister of Great Staughton, in the county of Huntington.
titleStmt.author: Gaule, John, 1604?-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Lloyd and Roger Vaughan, for Henry Brome, at the Gun in Ivy-lane.,

notesStmt.note: [5] p. at end = advertisements for Henry Brome.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
